# sendgrid_ipwhitelist (Data Source)

Allows to retrive IP Access management details

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "sendgrid_ipwhitelist" "ipwhitelist" {
  id = 1234567
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (Number) ID of the IP address

### Read-Only

- `ip` (String) IP address
